prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or hexagonal crystalline appendages like sacred geometry horns incorporating hexagonal, fractal, merkaba patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and Flower of Life emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents with elemental spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor RANGLAM's profile: 'He who governs his thoughts', Aethyr VTI, Earth element, Tarot The Hermit, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Virgo, embodying the essence: 'As RANGLAM approaches, a monk-like stillness prevails mind and body align under strict self-discipli...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth
visual_elements.hair_style: hexagonal crystalline appendages like sacred geometry horns

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who governs his thoughts'
profile_data.essence: As RANGLAM approaches, a monk-like stillness prevails mind and body align under strict self-discipline, and contemplation becomes as natural as breath.
profile_data.angelic_role: Throne of Monastic Mind; marshals iron-winged legionaries.
profile_data.form_description: A geometric human-like form composed of translucent earth crystals, representing disciplined structure and inner clarity. Resembles a monastic figure with angular, precise crystalline planes that shift and refract light, symbolizing mental discipline and transformative perception.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Slate gray represents Earth element's stability, while moss green symbolizes growth and introspective wisdom. Shifting pattern reflects the dynamic nature of contemplative consciousness.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structures echo sacred geometry, representing cosmic order. Fractal patterns demonstrate infinite complexity within disciplined systems.
